search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Azure DevOps (azure-devops.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text:
The official pricing page for Azure DevOps is located at:

[https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/details/devops/](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/details/devops/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Azure DevOps Services Pricing | Microsoft Azure

Prices are estimates only and are not intended as actual price quotes. Actual pricing may vary depending on the type of agreement entered with Microsoft, date of purchase, and the currency exchange rate. Prices are calculated based on US dollars and converted using London closing spot rates that are captured in the two business days prior to the last business day of the previous month end. If the two business days prior to the end of the month fall on a bank holiday in major markets, the rate setting day is generally the day immediately preceding the two business days. This rate applies to all transactions during the upcoming month. Sign in to the [Azure pricing calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/calculator/) to see pricing based on your current program/offer with Microsoft. Contact an [Azure sales specialist](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/contact/pricing/) for more information on pricing or to request a price quote. See [frequently asked questions](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/) about Azure pricing.

US government entities are eligible to purchase Azure Government services from a licensing solution provider with no upfront financial commitment, or directly through a pay-as-you-go online subscription.

[Learn more](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/explore/global-infrastructure/government/)

Important—The price in R$ is merely a reference; this is an international transaction and the final price is subject to exchange rates and the inclusion of IOF taxes. An eNF will not be issued.

![Image 8](https://azure.microsoft.com/cdn-classic/cvt-0d1a5448534ecd11bba7282685849498804c12f6a89972267b051ddbf27d0a6a/images/page/pricing/details/devops/scuba.svg)

Azure Pipelines

![Image 9](https://azure.microsoft.com/cdn-classic/cvt-0d1a5448534ecd11bba7282685849498804c12f6a89972267b051ddbf27d0a6a/images/page/pricing/details/devops/pipelines.svg)

10 Free parallel jobs  
for public projects

*   10 Free parallel jobs with unlimited minutes per month, 1 Free for Microsoft-hosted CD/CI parallel job with up to 1,800 minutes per month and 1 Free for Self-hosted CD/CI parallel job with unlimited minutes per month

Azure DevOps

![Image 10](https://azure.microsoft.com/cdn-classic/cvt-0d1a5448534ecd11bba7282685849498804c12f6a89972267b051ddbf27d0a6a/images/page/pricing/details/devops/test-plan.svg)

First 5 users free,  
then $6 per user per month

*   Azure Pipelines: 10 Free parallel jobs with unlimited minutes per month, 1 Free for Microsoft-hosted CD/CI parallel job with up to 1,800 minutes per month and 1 Free for Self-hosted CD/CI parallel job with unlimited minutes per month
*   Azure Boards: Work item tracking and Kanban boards
*   Azure Repos: Unlimited private Git repos
*   Azure Artifacts: 2 GiB free

![Image 11](https://azure.microsoft.com/cdn-classic/cvt-0d1a5448534ecd11bba7282685849498804c12f6a89972267b051ddbf27d0a6a/images/page/pricing/details/devops/visual-studio.svg)

Visual Studio subscribers get free access to Azure DevOps.

Subscribers get access to any number of organizations and don't count against your 5 free users.

| Product and Features | Stakeholders (Free) | Basic | Basic + Test plans | Open Source |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Azure Boards
 |
| Create and edit work items, including bugs, requirements, and tasks | Available | Available | Available | Available |
| Search and query work items | Available | Available | Available | Available |
| View backlog and boards | Available | Available | Available | Available |
| [Set alerts and get notified about changing work items](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/work/track/alerts-and-notifications/) | Available | Available | Available | Available |
| [Provide feedback](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/manual-test/stakeholder/provide-stakeholder-feedback) | Available | Available | Available | Available |
| [Request feedback](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/manual-test/stakeholder/request-stakeholder-feedback) | Not available | Available | Available | Available |
| Agile tools (Kanban boards, backlogs, sprint planning, portfolio management) | Not available | Available | Available | Available |
| [Create new work item tags](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/work/track/add-tags-to-work-items) | Not available | Available | Available | Available |
| [Delivery plans](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/work/scale/review-team-plans) | Not available | Available | Available | Available |
| Azure Repos

 |
| [Unlimited Git repositories](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/products/devops/repos/) | Not available | Available | Available | Available |
| Connect to your code using Xcode, Eclipse, InteliJ, Android Studio, Visual Studio, Visual Studio Code, and more | Not available | Available | Available | Available |
| [Centralized version control with Team Foundation Version Control, including Code Review](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/repos/tfvc/overview?view=vsts) | Not available | Available | Available | Available |
| [Powerful semantic code search](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/search/code/code-search) | Not available | Available | Available | Available |
| Azure Pipelines

 |
| [Continuous integration and deployment](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/products/devops/pipelines/) | Available | Available | Available | Available |
| [Approve releases](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/build-release/actions/define-multistage-release-process#approve) | Available | Available | Available | Available |
| Azure Artifacts

 |
| [Store 2 GiB free in artifacts](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/products/devops/artifacts/) | Available | Available | Available | Available |
| Azure Test Plans

 |
| [Exploratory testing](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms.vss-exploratorytesting-web) | Available | Available | Available | Available |
| [Create and manage Test Plans](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/products/devops/test-plans/) | Not available | Not available | Available | Available |
| [Web-based test execution from Test Runner](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/test/run-manual-tests?view=azure-devops) | Not available | Available | Available | Available |
| [Add and run tests from the Kanban board](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/boards/boards/add-run-update-tests?toc=%2Fazure%2Fdevops%2Ftest%2Ftoc.json&bc=%2Fazure%2Fdevops%2Ftest%2Fbreadcrumb%2Ftoc.json) | Not available | Available | Available | Available |
| Other features

 |

![Image 12](https://azure.microsoft.com/cdn-classic/cvt-0d1a5448534ecd11bba7282685849498804c12f6a89972267b051ddbf27d0a6a/images/shared/services/devops/timetracker.png)Timetracker

![Image 13](https://azure.microsoft.com/cdn-classic/cvt-0d1a5448534ecd11bba7282685849498804c12f6a89972267b051ddbf27d0a6a/images/shared/services/devops/docker.png)Docker Integration

![Image 14](https://azure.microsoft.com/cdn-classic/cvt-0d1a5448534ecd11bba7282685849498804c12f6a89972267b051ddbf27d0a6a/images/shared/services/devops/slack.png)Slack Integration

![Image 15](https://azure.microsoft.com/cdn-classic/cvt-0d1a5448534ecd11bba7282685849498804c12f6a89972267b051ddbf27d0a6a/images/shared/services/devops/sentry.png)Sentry

![Image 16](https://azure.microsoft.com/cdn-classic/cvt-0d1a5448534ecd11bba7282685849498804c12f6a89972267b051ddbf27d0a6a/images/shared/services/devops/github.png)GitHub Integration

Support & SLA

*   We guarantee at least 99.9% availability of Azure DevOps Services for paid Azure DevOps Services users, including users with paid User-Based Extensions to Azure DevOps Services, to access the associated Azure DevOps Services organization.
    
*   We guarantee at least 99.9% availability to execute load testing operations using the paid Azure Test Plans Load Testing Service.
    
*   We guarantee at least 99.9% availability to execute build and deployment operations using the paid Azure Pipelines.
    
*   Availability is calculated over a monthly billing cycle.
    

Frequently asked questions

*   Each Azure DevOps organization gets one parallel job with 1,800 minutes (30 hours) of build time every month using Microsoft-hosted agents. If you need more time or would like to run more than one job at a time, simply buy the number of pipelines you need. When you buy your first Microsoft-hosted pipeline, the number of parallel jobs in the organization remains at one; this purchase removes only the time limit on the free pipeline. To run two jobs concurrently, buy two Microsoft-hosted pipelines.
    
    Additionally, each Azure DevOps organization gets one free self-hosted agent that can be used to run one parallel job with unlimited minutes. If you need to run more parallel jobs, simply buy more self-hosted pipelines.

Explore the different Azure DevOps pricing options for open source projects, small teams, and teams of all sizes.
